notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: The following Scandinavians bought or sold real estate in Chicago recently:
J. Weinberg to Emma Johnson: Edgewater Place and Perry Street. Price, $3,200.
A. Johnson to R. F. Zielim: Leavitt and Ainslee Streets. Price, $1,700.
Chicago Title & Trust Company to Edwin Anderson: Giddings Street, corner of 59th Avenue. Price, $1,800.
C. P. Kenning to Engbret Evensen: Spaulding and Fullerton Avenues. Price, $1,600.
Gustav Borkman to Hugo C. Dahl: 333 Franklin Street. Price, $8,500.
Chicago Title & Trust Company to Theodor Johnson: Union Avenue, corner of 76th Street. Price, $2,000.
Henry Meltzer to M. Josephson: South Halsted Street. Price, $20,000.
